column2: <START> 155  For your information heated floor is not an advanced tech  in KoreaIt is a basic housing system more than a  thousand years in Korea And of course taking off shoes inside the house makes you keep the house very clean and enjoy the benefit of heated floor lying down on floor
<START> I walk in with my shoes on and I see you with your shoes on and I can't focus on the video since
<START> Such a disgusting person not taking his shoes off inside
<START> I know the hot water is something that I would appreciate, but I would feel awkward walking inside with my shoes
<START> Eating live animals Im just an average Korean and Ive never eaten a live animal in 43 years But dried squid is good You should give it a try
<START> I felt so uncomfortable that reporter didnt take off his shoes while he get inside the room
<START> Plz take your shoes off nooooooooooo
<START> Oh no shoes indoors are absolutely no no in Korea
<START> If my grandmother saw this, it flew off her back
<START> It would have been better if the athletes' village and media Village had bidets
<START> The reporter looked genuinely excited Hope he had so much fun time in Korea
<START> What kinda F question is that hot water or not  Of course there is hot water out of faucet
<START> I'm not comfortable with my shoes
<START> There is a saying to the Comrades: "Take off your shoes."
